argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mamumat1cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mamumat1cl.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 3 |  | mamumat1cl.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mamumat1cl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mamumat1cl.i | |- I = ( i e. M , j e. M |-> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) ) |
| 6 |  | mamumat1cl.m | |- ( ph -> M e. Fin ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. e. B ) |
| 8 | 1, 4 | #P_ring0cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> .0. e. B ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ifcld | |- ( R e. Ring -> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( i e. M /\ j e. M ) ) -> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ralrimivva | |- ( ph -> A. i e. M A. j e. M if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) e. B ) |
| 13 | 5 | #P_fmpt2 | |- ( A. i e. M A. j e. M if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) e. B <-> I : ( M X. M ) --> B ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> I : ( M X. M ) --> B ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 17 |  | #P_xpfi | |- ( ( M e. Fin /\ M e. Fin ) -> ( M X. M ) e. Fin ) |
| 18 | 6, 6, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( M X. M ) e. Fin ) |
| 19 |  | #P_elmapg | |- ( ( B e. _V /\ ( M X. M ) e. Fin ) -> ( I e. ( B ^m ( M X. M ) ) <-> I : ( M X. M ) --> B ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 18, 19 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( I e. ( B ^m ( M X. M ) ) <-> I : ( M X. M ) --> B ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 20 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> I e. ( B ^m ( M X. M ) ) ) |
